column5: Got out yesterday with a buddy of mine to give the carp a go...  tried Hammy Harbor - Froze like idiots for an hour and a half  switched it up and went down to St. Catherines  for the rest of the morning/afternoon...  Landed my first carp of 09

Good job on your first of the year, I too was out for some Carping on Friday . I just happened to be on my favorite eastern trib. and caught my personel best, just over 30 lbs. It looks like it is going to be a  fine year.
The first of many this year for ya, Buck!  Good shootin' and it won't be long for the action to heat up at the harbour!
Congrats on the 1st of 09!  The bite has been pretty good at the hammy already, i guess the cold front just turned them off a bit.
awww crap... Goran, have you switched to the dark side too? Geez man!  G
No, I'm just waiting for you to call and say lets go trolling...  don't worry i've got 10X the amount of salmon gear compared to carp gear
Nice one Buck, what was the bait of choice? Or is it a secret    .

It's Corn, but don't tell anyone... i don't want the word to get out on my secret bait...  I don't believe that boilies work all that great down here unless you really dump alot of them in there...  for me corn works best... i think i've only caught 1 carp on a boilie
No secret cherry kool-aid or jello crystals in the mix?

Where's the reports and pics Vic???    Dat's a nice Goldfish ya got there Goran!!!   I've been thinking aboot trying a spot for them down here... not sure if I could ever dig myself outta the hole if I posted a report on the board aboot them though...
Nice job! Going to get out soon for my 1st of 09.  Thanks for sharing, Mike

Since when did you care what other peoples think my friend...  Myself and quite a few others here would love to read a carp report from you...  Go catch one Dawg and see what you've been missing...  Cheers!!!...Mate
Great report and pic Uncle Buck  Nothing feels better than catching the very first fish of the season.... Beauty Thanks for sharing Leechman
